title: Ticket #2796: avoid reusing the claim on glexec failure
description:
If I remember correctly, in 7.7.X Condor will put a job on hold if glexec fails, right?

But then what... it will ask for a new job on the existing claim? If so, the next job is likely to fail in the same way! Hint: A claim is for a specific user for similar jobs (same autocluster).

Can you break the claim on the Startd side when you put a job on hold for these kind of reasons, so we at least have some hope to get a different user here?
creator: zmiller
